roleset.name: not be so harsh anymore
roleset.note: RELENT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'relent' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from relent.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: relax already!
example.text: Ms. Browning says she believes a recapitalization involving employee ownership would succeed only if the pilots relent on their demand for control.
